description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

《skinny love》是美国独立摇滚乐队Bon Iver的作品[1]
Skinny Loves收录在Bon Iver2008年的专辑《For Emma, Forever Ago》。被用在实习医生第五季的第二集大概十四分钟的位置。
2011年，14岁的Birdy翻唱并发行了美国歌手Bon Iver的一首歌曲Skinny Love，该单曲为她首次打入英国排行榜（the UK charts)，也被选入BBC Raddio 1的播放榜单。2011年5月1日，Skinny Love在英国单曲排行榜（UK Singles Charts)的排名为第19位。
2011年5月，Skinny Love被选入美剧“吸血鬼日记”第二季第21集<The Sun Also Rises>的插曲。

模唱部分：

全曲：

Come on skinny love just last the year
Pour a little salt we were never here
My, my, my, my, my, my, my, my
Staring at the sink of blood and crushed veneer
I tell my love to wreck it all
Cut out all the ropes and let me fall
My, my, my, my, my, my, my, my
Right in the moment this order's tall

模唱：

伴奏：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Skinny Love

description:
But first on Sportsworld this Saturday, are you ready for a World Cup in November and December? One of the main talking points throughout this week in football is that the FIFA task force has recommended a November-December World Cup in 2022. That's due to the high temperatures in Qatar in June and July. They can climb to over 40 degrees Celsius. FIFA's proposal is expected to be ratified by FIFA's Executive Committee in Zurich next month. And to discuss the implications on my Sportsworld panel this week, I was joined by the former New Zealand fly-half Nick Evans and the Tottenham Hotspur and Bayern Munich midfielder Allan Nielsen.

Obviously here it's amazing first of all that we can play in Qatar, and the only way you can play in Qatar is obviously during the winter time. This is totally new to the football world, to the football calendar, all the games all the tournaments around the globe. The good thing about it obviously would be that Splatta, the news is been out saying that the last game would be played not later than the 18th of December. So obviously that could protect the English football's traditional Boxing Day programme. 

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<
